ques: The selection process seemed ________, with no clear criteria.
She needs to ________ her essay before submitting it.
The school requires students to wear a ________ as part of the dress code.
The decision to ________ the project was made due to budget constraints.
The medicine can help ________ sleep and reduce anxiety.
In many cultures, the color white ________ purity.
Efforts should be made to ________ the environmental impact of the project.
The art gallery will ________ a collection of modern paintings.
The red wine is a perfect ________ to the steak.
In this region, agriculture is the ________ industry.
The persuasive speech aimed to ________ change in public opinion.
The museum will ________ rare artifacts from ancient civilizations.
His skills ________ hers, creating a highly effective team.
Many animals are ________ by their parents shortly after birth.
Soldiers wear a ________ to identify their rank and unit.
The author decided to ________ the final chapter of the book.
To stay healthy, it's important to ________ stress in your life.
The symbol 'X' can ________ an unknown variable in mathematics.
English is the ________ language spoken in many countries.
Her ________ decision angered many employees.
The colors of the artwork ________ each other beautifully.
She will ________ her photography at the upcoming exhibition.
The rising sun often ________ a new beginning.
The teacher asked the students to ________ their answers.
The company aims to ________ production costs to increase profits.
The referee's call was criticized as being ________.
The smell of freshly baked bread can ________ a feeling of hunger.
He chose to ________ his old career and pursue a new passion.
The ________ color in her wardrobe is blue.
The airline crew members have a specific ________.
The science fair will feature projects ________ by local students.
The dessert was a wonderful ________ to the meal.
He tried to ________ the significance of his mistake.
The word 'cat' ________ a domesticated feline.
In the forest, evergreen trees are the ________ species.
The company plans to ________ its marketing strategy.
The scientist's research may ________ breakthroughs in the field.
In some professions, employees wear a ________ as a symbol of their role.
The ship was ________ on the deserted island.
The new policy was implemented in an ________ manner.
It's essential not to ________ safety measures in construction.
During the summer, the ________ weather condition is heat.
We need to avoid making ________ decisions without proper analysis.
The zoo ________ a variety of exotic animals.
Her calm demeanor ________ his nervous energy.
The police officer's ________ signifies authority.
Proper safety measures can help ________ workplace accidents.
The teacher's encouragement can ________ students to excel.
It's important to ________ your goals as circumstances change.
His smile ________ his happiness and contentment.
